name: Hypercoven
description:
v0 - Single Player Conquest

You, malevolent King, have learned the ways of Sorcery – now you want to unleash domination upon the whole world.

Can you bind all free peoples to your will?

Or will your Evil Empire crumble like all that came before -

Roguelike RTS Experience

Every run is different, how fast can you win?

If you can win at all.

Roadmap Maybe

Sound, Multiplayer, Replays, More Units, Configurable Experience, UI Dialogs -

Credits

Huge thanks to all creators selling awesome assets on itch - find all the assets employed here ("Supported by") -> https://filmstars.itch.io/

Made with SDL2.
